Title: Exempts retired peace officers from the crime of criminal possession of a firearm, rifle or shotgun in a sensitive location
Summary: Exempts retired peace officers from the crime of criminal possession of a firearm, rifle or shotgun in a sensitive location.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to exempting retired peace officers from the crime of criminal possession of a firearm, rifle or shotgun in a sensitive location
